product_name: REI Bella Knee-High Socks - Women's - 2012 Special Buy
long_description: Knee-high coverage and soft merino wool combine in the REI Bella socks to offer lightweight, breathable warmth for your cold-weather walks. REI Bella Knee-High sock bottoms are padded with lightweight terry; legs and tops of feet are a slim flat-knit. Merino wool naturally regulates temperature in any climate, wicks moisture and resists odors. Nylon provides durability; Lycra(R) spandex provides stretch to improve fit. Flat toe seams prevent chafing; machine washable. Special Buy.
short_description: Knee-high coverage and soft merino wool combine in the REI Bella socks to offer lightweight, breathable warmth for your cold-weather walks.
